FAIL_TO_PASS: when subcommand has mixed arguments then program flags removed and rest returned in same order
when execArgv --inspect=0 then spawn execArgs --inspect=0
when script arg then search for local files
when conflict on program calling external subcommand then throw conflict
when execArgv empty then spawn execArgs empty
when specify subcommand and option and argument then program.args not empty
when option used with program then source is defined
when implies on program and use subcommand then program updated
when program sent SIGUSR1 then executableSubcommand sent signal too
when executableSubcommand succeeds then call exitOverride
when program option before sub option then program option read by program
when options in sub and program then optsWithGlobals includes both
when specify subcommand and argument then program.args not empty
when conflict on program calling action subcommand then throw conflict
when .action called then program.args only contains args
when name pm and script arg and relative executableFile then spawn local exec.js
when shared option before and after subcommand then both parsed
when hook program on preAction and call sub then thisCommand has program options set
when execArgv --inspect then spawn execArgs using port 9230
when script arg and relative executableDir then spawn relative script-sub.js
